page.title: 09Modern Technology
page.content: MODERN TECHNOLOGY HAS HELPED BUSINESSES AND FIRMS IN OUR AREA A LOT. MOSTLY FIRMS USE THE COMPUTERS FOR BUDGETING AND STORING SALES IMFORMATION BUT IN SOME CASES THE COMPUTERS ARE USED TO PROGRAM ROBOTICS. CONCERN ABOUT POLLUTION IS NOT A BIG PROBLEM BECAUSE WE HAVE NOT GOT MANY BIG FACTORIES AROUND PUMPING OUT LOTS OF SMOKE. AGRICULTURAL FERTILIZERS ARE USED A LOT BECAUSE A LOT OF THE AREA IS FARM LAND,FERTILIZERS ARE USED FOR ENRICHING THE SOIL WITH PLANT FOODS. THIS MAKES THE PLANTS MORE HEALTHY AND QUICK GROWING. HOME COMPUTERS ARE A POPULAR TOY FOR CHILDREN IN THIS AREA.
